channel.title: RuneKings - The King of Runescape Private Servers
channel.description:
[center][size=20pt]RuneKings[/size] The King of Runescape Private Servers
Hi, I'm making a Runescape Private Server, [u][b]it will be unique.[/b][/u] I decided I will [b]not[/b] need another coder.
Economy: In my opinon this is the most important part in a sucessful server. The economy will be mainly focues on Monster drops and Skills. Monster drops will be realistic, Goblins won't drop Money, Dragon Bones, Rune, etc. It will drop about 3GP, Feathers, and Bones. Abbysal Demons will drop Whips, Dragons will drop D hide and Dragon bones, Dark Beasts will drop Dark Bows, etc. There will be no thieving stalls that give a couple million GP at the "home area" [i]You will actually have to work for your items.[/i] There is no "Shops" area, the shops are spread throughout the map, and they only sell the basic supplies. Skill is also important part of an economy which will be explained next.
Skills: Skilling is a very important part of a sucessful server. The EXP rate will be ALOT lower then most servers. In my opinion, that's fun. Why? If everyone had 99 Skills, it wouldn't be fun, knowing that your 99 isn't an accomplishment. You want your hard work to be rewarding. A 99 WILL BE an accomplishment, people will go "Wow, he has 99 Mining! Do the emote!" Skilling is also a critical part of the economy. Example: A high level fisher sells his sharks to a high level cooker, the cooker then cooks them and sells them to PKers. It all connects.
Combat: Combat is one of my favorite things on a server, ecspecially Player Vs. Player (PVP.) Like the Skilling, the EXP will be ALOT lower then most private servers. The combat system will be [b]perfected,[/b] unlike any other server, you can count on that. I'll also perfect Player Vs. Monster (PVM,) and Monster Vs. Monster (MVM.) There [u]won't be any shitty custom items that are WAY overpowered.[/u] Item bonuses will be like Runescape, and the special attacks will be realistic as well. The combat triangle (Range, Magic and Melee) will be fair.
Other: There will be no "home area," the place you start and respawn will be Lumbridge. Every place in Runescape will be accesbile, some how. There also will be quests, like Runescape, you will need a certain skill requirement(s), I also might make a few custom quests. There will be the basic minigames, Pest Control, Barrows, Castle Wars, etc. Also the teleports will only go to the specific place: Camelot teleport = Camelot. I'm still deciding if I should make you have the Runes and specified level, you can leave a comment about that. Sorry about that, that was messy. I was just brain storming.
Updates: [b]12/7/09:[/b] Began working on Sounds Made a few quests Began working on a flawless combat system (just the basics) Added a shit load of Npcs around the map Made a few basic shops Npc Dialouge
Current team: Rune.Kings
Msn: Rune.Kings@hotmail.com [/center]

item.dc:creator: @Rune.Kings Rune.Kings
item.description:
@Rune.Kings wrote:

[quote=“glestrts, post:25, topic:318148”]Sounds okay, i might test it out, because i personally hate the overpowered weapons in rs…

A few Questions.

The King of Runescape Private Servers

why is it the king?

There will be no “home area,” the place you start and respawn will be Lumbridge. Every place in Runescape will be accesbile, some how.

sounds nice, so you will have a full autospawn?

There also will be quests, like Runescape, you will need a certain skill requirement(s), I also might make a few custom quests.

ouch, i always hated making runescape quests, the dialogue was just annoying…

There will be the basic minigames, Pest Control, Barrows, Castle Wars, etc.

goodluck making this, minigames are key for any server, and in my opinion show how the server will end up.[/quote]

Just a catchy name =)

I currently DO have the full autospawn

There might be no quests, I’ll make a poll to find out if people want it, or not.

Thanks =)

Read full topic

item.title: RuneKings - The King of Runescape Private Servers
item.dc:creator: @Rune.Kings Rune.Kings
item.description:
@Rune.Kings wrote:

DyanRean:

I love this I love what your doing it sounds like your going to be pretty successful with this project and I agree with you the Economy is one of the most important parts which is why I advise you to not put a GE in there because the GE is what screwed over runescape completely for me anyways. Everything now has sky rocketing prices and they can’t do anything to fix it either because if they change the prices everyone will have all this money already and everyone will buy all the once expensive items and they will go back up in price range and everyone will be completely OVERPOWERED. Thats why I’m going to be making my mod with a completely perfect economy balance. Shops have fixed rate, only sell basic items like you stated, and players make their own prices when they trade. its great and you can trade items for items how much better could that get? I support 100% and can’t wait to see pictures of your progress. Oh and I want to be a player the minute you start letting people test it out I wanna help lol.

I PMed you, maybe you can be the only beta tester?

Read full topic
